duties_responsibilities.duty: Receive and process new title orders via email, verifying the correct property address and customer information.
Enter verified information into the database and determine which orders are sent to the production teams.
Keep track of orders outsourced internally in Excel.
Heavy data entry processing new orders and managing the flow of new orders.
Uploading files and reporting internally outbound orders in Excel.
Performing administrative duties such as filing, scanning, copying, and mail distribution.
Assisting various departments with special projects or assignments as necessary.
